content: this pattern is also available as a pdf here 1 this pattern is an adaptation of the multidirectional diagonal scarf pattern by karen baumer 2 for fingering weight cotton i increase to 66 sts on size 3 needles second picture note i was reading cat bordhi s new pathways for sock knitters p 11 and learned how to make a smoother ssk in this cloth pattern after you do the ssk and turn then knit that first stitch the loop that was made from doing the ssk through the back loop it really decreases the bump to almost nothing 1 http //webpages charter net/lotzastitches/multidirectional%20diagonal%20dishcloth pdf 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/multidirectional-diagonal-scarf
